entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with snow early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to light snow and ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the morning then light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
